name: Daily Deductible Information
description: This data type specifies the detail information for the daily deductible.

fields.name: Delay Days
fields.description: The number of days after which the daily deductible begins

fields.name: Monetary Amount
fields.description: The monetary amount of the deductible

fields.name: Number Of Days
fields.description: The number of days to apply the deductible. If this component is not populated, it means that the number of days is indefinite.
